name: Excel Batch Formatter
description: Batch format Excel workbooks to firm standards — Calibri 10pt, consistent headers, print-ready layouts
longDescription:
Standardizes the formatting of all Excel workbooks in a directory to match your firm's standards. No more manually reformatting client-provided spreadsheets.

Applies the following formatting:
- Font: Calibri 10pt throughout
- Headers: Bold, bottom border, frozen panes
- Column widths: Auto-fit with minimum/maximum constraints
- Number formats: Proper accounting format for currency columns
- Print setup: Landscape, fit to page, repeat header rows
- Removes excessive colors, merged cells, and non-standard formatting

Processes entire directories of workbooks in one run. Original files are preserved — formatted copies are saved to the output directory.
instructions:
1. Open Excel
2. Press Alt+F11 to open the VBA Editor
3. Import the BatchFormatter.bas module (File > Import)
4. Close the VBA Editor
5. Press Alt+F8, select 'BatchFormatWorkbooks', and click Run
6. Select the folder containing your workbooks when prompted
7. Formatted copies will be saved to a 'Formatted' subfolder
requirements: Microsoft Excel 2016 or later (Windows), macros must be enabled
